text: (UFaro) wathi (kubalumbi bakhe), “nikholwe kuye ngaphambi kokuba ngininike imvume na? Ngempela yena ungumholi wenu onifundise umlingo ngakho-ke ngempela ngizoninquma izandlazenukanyenezinyawozenuezinhlangothiniezehlukene futhi ngempela ngizoninqamuleza eziqwini zemithi yesundu futhi ngempela nizokwazi ukuthi ngubani phakathi kwethu onzima ekujeziseni okubeleselayo”
